debt.name: Debt Servicing
debt.description: Interest payments, bond obligations, and national debt management.

1.name: Minimum Payments
1.benefit: Interest payments covered. Credit rating stable. No default risk.

2.name: Principal Reduction
2.benefit: Actively paying down principal. Debt-to-GDP ratio improving.

3.name: Fiscal Discipline
3.benefit: Running surplus budgets. Building sovereign wealth fund.

4.name: AAA Rated
4.benefit: Highest credit rating. Lowest borrowing costs globally. Economic safe haven.

health.name: Public Health & Well-being
health.description: Hospitals, Pharmaceuticals, Mental Health, and Pandemic Control.

1.name: The Safety Net
1.benefit: No citizen dies from lack of urgent care. Ambulances are functional.

2.name: Standard Care
2.benefit: Elective surgeries in weeks, not months. Family doctors available same-day.

3.name: Total Coverage
3.benefit: Teeth and eyes are fully covered. Mental health therapy is free.

4.name: Universal Prevention
4.benefit: Free annual checkups for all. Comprehensive cancer screening. Top 5 global health outcomes.

infrastructure.name: Infrastructure & Transport
infrastructure.description: Roads, Rail, Water Systems, Internet, and Waste Management.

1.name: Basic Connectivity
1.benefit: Major highways paved annually. Potable water in all taps.

2.name: Digital Nation
2.benefit: High-speed fiber internet for every home, including rural farms.

3.name: High-Speed Network
3.benefit: Connect major cities in under 2 hours. Domestic flights obsolete.

4.name: Mobility as a Right
4.benefit: All subways, buses, and trains are 100% free for everyone.

defense.name: Safety & Defense
defense.description: Military, Police, Fire Services, Cyber-Security, and Borders.

1.name: Sovereignty
1.benefit: Borders are monitored. Basic police response times are stable.

2.name: Rapid Response
2.benefit: Rescue teams deploy to any flood or fire zone within 4 hours.

3.name: Cyber Resilience
3.benefit: Critical systems hardened against attacks. Rapid incident response teams. Public cybersecurity awareness.

4.name: Regional Security Leader
4.benefit: Advanced defense capabilities. Active peacekeeping contributions. Strong mutual defense alliances.

education.name: Education & Innovation
education.description: Schools, Universities, R&D Grants, Space Agencies, and Arts.

1.name: Literacy
1.benefit: Every child guaranteed a desk, books, and a teacher up to age 18.

2.name: Skilled Workforce
2.benefit: Free vocational training for plumbers, coders, and electricians.

3.name: Knowledge Economy
3.benefit: Higher education is free. Zero student debt society.

4.name: Innovation Nation
4.benefit: Top 10 global university rankings. R&D spending at 3%+ GDP. Thriving startup ecosystem.

environment.name: Environment & Resources
environment.description: Parks, Pollution Control, Green Energy, and Agriculture.

1.name: Clean Up
1.benefit: Smog eliminated from cities. Industrial waste sites cleaned.

2.name: Preservation
2.benefit: 20% of national land designated as protected nature reserves.

3.name: The Transition
3.benefit: Grid runs on Wind/Solar/Nuclear only. Fossil fuels banned.

4.name: Carbon Neutral
4.benefit: Net-zero emissions reached. Climate adaptation infrastructure complete. Global environmental leadership.

1.name: Dignity
1.benefit: Food banks and emergency shelters available for the desperate.

2.name: Safety Net
2.benefit: Unemployment benefits cover 80% of lost salary for 6 months.

3.name: Family First
3.benefit: State-funded daycare and 1 year paid parental leave.

4.name: Post-Scarcity
4.benefit: Every citizen receives a monthly stipend to cover basic needs.

governance.name: Governance & Diplomacy
governance.description: Administration, Tax Collection, Foreign Aid, and Justice.

1.name: Functionality
1.benefit: The government can collect funds and count votes accurately.

2.name: Efficiency
2.benefit: No paper forms. All permits and licenses handled via app instantly.

3.name: Global Aid
3.benefit: Massive foreign aid budget increases global influence and trade.

4.name: Transparent Democracy
4.benefit: Open data government. Independent anti-corruption courts. Top global trust and transparency rankings.
